LanguageData.Assassin20.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] {PAWN_gender ? був професійним: була професійною} вбивцею. [PAWN_pronoun] {PAWN_gender ? був холоднокровним, розумним і добре заробляв : була холоднокровною, розумною і добре заробляла} на цьому. У цьому бізнесі повна відсутність співчуття є перевагою.
LanguageData.Assassin20.title: вбивця
LanguageData.Gigolo30.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was used for [PAWN_possessive] body by hundreds of customers in brothels on several planets. [PAWN_pronoun] gained some mental marks and a special kind of street smarts.
LanguageData.Gigolo30.title: gigolo
LanguageData.IllegalShipwright76.baseDesc: There is a law that says that you're not allowed to put terawatt-range grasers on a cargo scow. Especially if you hide them under what looks like a communications dish for better ambush potential. [PAWN_nameDef] discovered that there is great profit to be made, however, from those who are uninterested in these laws.
LanguageData.IllegalShipwright76.title: illegal shipwright
LanguageData.PitBrawler76.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was nine years old when [PAWN_pronoun] got in [PAWN_possessive] first fight. [PAWN_pronoun] won, but more important was the enjoyment of [PAWN_possessive] audience. Pit fighting turned out to be a lucrative career for those who could survive it. And it was even mostly legal.
LanguageData.PitBrawler76.title: pit brawler
LanguageData.SpaceMarine16.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior in an Imperial navy. [PAWN_possessive] job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And [PAWN_pronoun] was good at it.
LanguageData.SpaceMarine16.title: space marine
LanguageData.SpacePirate55.baseDesc: Piracy appears everywhere that governments are weak and society spread thin. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of this age-old part of human existence, extorting and smashing peaceful trade ships for profit.
LanguageData.SpacePirate55.title: космічний пірат
